original_title: 獅子山下 ‧ 煙火人間
overview: Famous actress, Sharla Cheung, was first made known to the audiences prior to her fim debut with this story of Lee Nan (Sharla Cheung), who came to Hong Kong to be reunited with her husband, but later she depraved.
tagline: Fate is not yet done toying with them...
title: Hearth and Home
